# This file is automatically generated from cmake.toml - DO NOT EDIT
# See https://github.com/build-cpp/cmkr for more information

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

# Regenerate CMakeLists.txt automatically in the root project
set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT OFF)
if(CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR)
	set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT ON)

	# Bootstrap cmkr
	include(cmkr.cmake OPTIONAL RESULT_VARIABLE CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
	if(CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
		cmkr()
	endif()

	# Enable folder support
	set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)
endif()

# Create a configure-time dependency on cmake.toml to improve IDE support
if(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT)
	configure_file(cmake.toml cmake.toml COPYONLY)
endif()

project(CMakeMASM
	LANGUAGES
		ASM_MASM
)

# Target masmlib
set(CMKR_TARGET masmlib)
set(masmlib_SOURCES "")

list(APPEND masmlib_SOURCES
	"src/masmlib.asm"
	"include/masmlib.h"
)

list(APPEND masmlib_SOURCES
	cmake.toml
)

set(CMKR_SOURCES ${masmlib_SOURCES})
add_library(masmlib STATIC)

if(masmlib_SOURCES)
	target_sources(masmlib PRIVATE ${masmlib_SOURCES})
endif()

source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${masmlib_SOURCES})

target_include_directories(masmlib PUBLIC
	include
)

unset(CMKR_TARGET)
unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
